name: Hide and Seek (itch) (AwesomeRavenclaw)
description:
Welcome to Hide and Seek! 

You are a elven knight looking for an escaped goblin prisoner. Your job is to find her before the time runs out and she escapes.

Hint: She is known to hide in caves, houses and rooms

Use the arrow keys to move, space to jump, hold shift to  run, and move the cursor to turn the camera.
